Clear Transparent PVC COVID-19 Roller Blind (Blinds By Post)

This product is designed to protect both your customers and employees from the potential spread of COVID-19. This Fire Retardent PVC transparent roller blind is perfect for use to segregate staff in retail environments, without losing light or visibility of your workplace. These blinds have been used above counter tops, between factory workers and too between retail workers (such as Hairdressers and Nail Parlours). These see through roller blinds are essential in the above environments to protect the spread of aerosols from coughing, sneezing and day-to-day movements. We have designed this product so that the blinds can be installed directly onto any solid surface and also all suspended ceilings too! Hence they are perfect for office blocks too - they require a specific bracket which are available to purchase to fix onto the back bar of the roller blind which too ensures the weight of the product can be equally distributed along any fixing surface. We supply the blind on a rigid aluminium back bar and specify guide wires as standard; so that if there were any potential for the blind to swing around when in operation, the optional side guide wires enable the blind to run on two very discreet cables either side of the blind which effectively puts the blind under tension and prevents any potential hazards, for example in a hairdressers where outside doors are opening. The blind is operated by a 1000mm Chrome Metal Chain. Motorisation is possible for this blind type on an integrated battery or hardwired solution. Transparent PVC resin film with a low thermal conductivity, UV resistance tested for 1000 hours of sun exposure with high flexibility. Produced according to the European product regulations concerning dangerous chemical substances as Regulation 1907/2006 named REACH. The transparent PVC can simply be washed with soap and water to keep it clear from germs, and clean to see through! **For orders over 100 units, we can offer a chargeable nationwide fitting service installed within 5-7 working days - please contact Customer Services should you have this type of enquiry and we will be happy to help** Please do let us know if you have any specific questions about this transparent clear plastic roller blind and we will be more than happy to help you further.  Discover our plastic clear roller blind here. Please let us know if you have any questions and we will be more than happy to help you further.

from £119.52
Shop now

Stirlo Oyster Cream (Blinds By Post)

Stirlo Oyster Cream Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.
